law.catch_line: Prohibition against long-term care facility's being operated by or employing a person on the nurse aide abuse registry.
law.text: Long-term care facilities as defined in KRS 216.510 shall not be operated by or employ any person who is listed on the nurse aide abuse registry required by 42 C.F.R. 483.156.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 424, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998.
